bill.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist municipalities of Verona, Plantersville and Shannon and Lee County with certain projects.
bill.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Verona, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With Infrastructure Improvements And Park Improvements; To Assist The Town Of Plantersville, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With Infrastructure Improvements And Park Improvements And The Purchase Of Equipment For The Town's Police Department; To Assist The Town Of Shannon, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With Infrastructure Improvements, Park Improvements, Natural Gas System Improvements And The Purchase Of Equipment For The Town's Police Department; To Assist Lee County, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With Construction Of A Volunteer Fire Department Building Near The Town Of Shannon, Mississippi, And Construction Of A Community Center Near Such Volunteer Fire Department Building; And For Related Purposes.
